input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='9 ft. Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Artificial Christmas Garland with Warm White LED Lights (2-Pack'
  - Name='Christmas Time Yardville Pine 2-ft. Prelit Artificial Christmas Porch Tree'
  - Name='Sullivans Home Decor 9' Prelit Pine Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 8" Pre-Lit Snow White Artificial Christmas Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Festive 9 Foot Pre Lit White and Red Garland'
  - Name='48 in. x 26 in. Christmas Tree Arbor 4-Piece Set with LED Lights and Garland'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6' Artificial Christmas Swag with 50 LED Lights, Berries and Pine Cones'
  - Name='Haute Decor 6 Foot Christmas Pre-Lit Mantel Swag'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Green Mountain Meadow Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Antique Fir Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company HGTV Home Collection Pre-Lit Christmas by the Sea Coral Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9 ft Pre-Lit North Conway Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Fir Pre-Lit Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Artificial mixed pine with pine cones & Gold Glitter garland'
  - Name='108'' in. Lighted Faux Fir Garland'
  - Name='Vickerman 50-foot Cheyenne Garland with LED Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Pre-Lit Mixed Cashmere Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Rod Works Allstate Floral Iced Cedar Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 144'' in. Lighted Garland'
  - Name='Kringle Traditions Dunhill Fir Prelit LED Holiday Garland'
  - Name='Sullivans Artificial Arborvitae Cedar Christmas Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 9 ft. Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Artificial Christmas Garland with Warm White LED Lights (2-Pack
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length and pre-lit feature with warm white LEDs but snow flocked finish differs from natural fir, and description does not specify pine cones or mixed branch tips.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Christmas Time Yardville Pine 2-ft. Prelit Artificial Christmas Porch Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Prelit pine product but a 2-foot porch tree, not a garland; different silhouette and application.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sullivans Home Decor 9' Prelit Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and prelit pine garland but different brand; likely similar construction and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 8" Pre-Lit Snow White Artificial Christmas Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and prelit garland but snow white color and clear lights differ; brand and exact branch type unspecified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Festive 9 Foot Pre Lit White and Red Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and prelit but color scheme likely very different and no details on branch type or pine cones.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 48 in. x 26 in. Christmas Tree Arbor 4-Piece Set with LED Lights and Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes garland but is part of a larger tree arbor set; product type and size differ significantly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6' Artificial Christmas Swag with 50 LED Lights, Berries and Pine Cones
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Prelit with pine cones like the reference, but shorter length (6') and swag shape rather than garland; less relevant but shares decorative elements.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor 6 Foot Christmas Pre-Lit Mantel Swag
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Prelit mantel swag but shorter and swag style differs from garland shape; likely similar use but less direct replacement.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Green Mountain Meadow Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland similar in function and style but no mention of prelit feature or pine cones; likely comparable quality with different branch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Antique Fir Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir garland like reference but no mention of lights or pine cones; similar silhouette but missing some features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company HGTV Home Collection Pre-Lit Christmas by the Sea Coral Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit garland but themed with coral, likely decorative style diverges from pine garland, lowering relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9 ft Pre-Lit North Conway Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and prelit garland, similar use; branch type unspecified but likely comparable product type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Fir Pre-Lit Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir prelit garland like the reference but length unspecified; likely very similar in appearance and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Artificial mixed pine with pine cones & Gold Glitter garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes mixed pine and pine cones like reference but gold glitter and unspecified lighting reduce direct similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 108'' in. Lighted Faux Fir Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Approx. 9 ft lighted fir garland, matching length and lighting but no mention of pine cones or mixed branch tips.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 50-foot Cheyenne Garland with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Prelit fir garland but much longer length (50 ft) and possibly different construction; suitable for larger spaces.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Pre-Lit Mixed Cashmere Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar to reference: prelit, mixed cashmere pine garland; likely matching key qualities including look and lighting.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rod Works Allstate Floral Iced Cedar Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland with cedar, possibly similar structure but different branch type and 'iced' finish; no lights mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 144'' in. Lighted Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted garland with length (12 ft) similar but longer than reference; branch type unspecified so moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kringle Traditions Dunhill Fir Prelit LED Holiday Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Prelit Dunhill Fir garland like some National Tree products; similar in branch type, lighting and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sullivans Artificial Arborvitae Cedar Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial garland with arborvitae cedar branch type, different from pine/fir; no mention of lights reduces similarity.
